function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious spread of psychological effects such as depression, stress, anger, anxiety, and insomnia due to quarantine and COVID-19 infection.","Impact":"Impaired mental health, increased risk of long-term psychological consequences, and reduced quality of life.","Mitigation":"Psychological support, social support, resilience-building interventions, and lifestyle changes.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, and remote counseling services.","People":"Individuals who have been quarantined, the general population exposed to COVID-19 infection.","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, mental health professionals, public health organizations."}]}
